TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TelemetryClientExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extension class to telemetry client that creates operation object with the respective fields initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder<T> StartOperation<T> (this Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, string operationName) where T : Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetrynew();

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder`1<!!T> StartOperation<.ctor (class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.Implementation.OperationTelemetry) T>(class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, string operationName) cil managed

Docs.param: Name of the operation that customer is planning to propagate.
Docs.summary: Start operation creates an operation object with a respective telemetry item.
Docs.returns: Operation item object with a new telemetry item having current start time and timestamp.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void StopOperation<T> (this Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder<T> operation);

.method public static hidebysig void StopOperation<T>(class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.TelemetryClient telemetryClient, class Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.Extensibility.IOperationHolder`1<!!T> operation) cil managed

Docs.param: Operation object to compute duration and track.
